titles.title: Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to expand access for rural-area small businesses, and for other purposes.
Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require the Advocate for Small Business Capital Formation within the Securities and Exchange Commission to report on issues encountered by rural-area small businesses.
